Alright this is the moment you‚Äôve all been waiting for ‚Äî 1 opinion per like on facial hair. Go!

Challenge tweet: https://t.co/LxW4X0kcTn https://t.co/hTB64le8bc

The goatee is the premium mediocre of facial hair. It conveys two things:

- I care enough about my appearance enough to make a fashion-related decision
- Other than that, I don‚Äôt care about fashion

Bearding competitions are a good use of America‚Äôs time.

https://t.co/mUX8hZuoDo

If I had to look like someone from Whisker Wars, I‚Äôd choose this guy.

He looks like a cross between John Lennon at his hippiest and the Johnnie Walker logo. 

(Wonder what that says about my aesthetic resonance.) https://t.co/7AEy5tlrkH

Beards that look like your face is being photographed at the first instant of a nuclear explosion are great. 

See comparison:

Karl Marx, Frederick Douglass, probably Bikini Atoll https://t.co/lyOIQSTzBJ

The ‚ÄúAbraham Lincoln‚Äù is ripe for re-discovery.

It has the commitment of a full beard and the strikingness of a distinctive mustache, and as a result could be revived at any moment by a ‚Äúmanosphere‚Äù guru worth his salt.
I like this graphic about the trustworthiness of facial hair. I wonder what relationship facial hair has to physiognomy, if any. https://t.co/gpkBXdvM41
If a man drastically alters his facial hair all of a sudden, ask him if he‚Äôs okay. He probably is.
Sideburns are one of the most under-exploited facial hair opportunities around. 1970s Elvis showed the world how to have epic sideburns. https://t.co/So7HWUrvBL
As a 13-year old, it‚Äôs better to shave your first mustache-esque protuberance than grow it out to ‚Äúshow how old you are.‚Äù It doesn‚Äôt work. Shave it once, THEN grow it out if you must.

You need a base line of aggression to pull off an old-west style mustache. I tried it once for about 5 minutes, and immediately felt the need to start defending it with fisticuffs. https://t.co/l3shY5J8hs

It‚Äôs perfectly fine to buy a flat iron for beards.

https://t.co/pwimEZHqj3
As a group, people who have horseshoe mustaches are universally some of the kindest people I‚Äôve ever met. https://t.co/bZHjczlAEv
12. A full-bearded man faces no greater challenge than eating s‚Äômores. Next time you‚Äôre camping, remember to be kind. https://t.co/SJlIa4CLZn
Martin Scorsese and Tim Draper are the only men known to sleep upside down, with their eyebrows wrapped around their bodies like bat wings.

Women buy eyelash extensions. Men will be buying eyebrow extensions within 5 years. 

Manscara.
Soul patches must not be too long nor too short. (Much like the soul.)

Learn to raise each eyebrow independently. 

Do ‚Äúthe wave.‚Äù

This raises interesting questions about how different our experience of embodiment can be, as we all share the same muscles but not the same access. (cc Wilhelm Reich) https://t.co/eYi3yKhGaS
People with long beards should avoid rollercoasters with on-ride photos.
